member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ChartForm class.

A string specifying the data source for the chart.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Spreadsheet.WinForms.ChartForm.#ctor(MindFusion.Spreadsheet.Worksheet,System.String,MindFusion.Spreadsheet.Charts.PlotBy)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ChartForm class.
member.param: The parent Worksheet that will contain the created chart.
A string specifying the data source for the chart.
A flag specifying whether the series are created from the columns or from the rows in the specified range.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Spreadsheet.WinForms.ChartForm.#ctor(MindFusion.Spreadsheet.Worksheet,System.String,MindFusion.Spreadsheet.Charts.PlotBy,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.Boolean},System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ChartForm class.
member.param: The parent Worksheet that will contain the created chart.
A string specifying the data source for the chart.
A flag specifying whether the series are created from the columns or from the rows in the specified range.
The column at which to place the newly created chart at.
The row at which to place the newly created chart at.

A flag specifying whether to use the values in the first column of the specified range as labels, or null, to attempt to automatically determine this based on the type of the data. This parameter is ignored by some charts that do not display labels.

A flag specifying whether to use the values in the first row of the specified range as labels, or null, to attempt to automatically determine this based on the type of the data. This parameter is ignored by some charts that do not display labels.
